alert.note: Alert for Central Marion; Eastern Marion; Eastern Putnam; Inland Flagler; Inland St. Johns; Western Putnam (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 21 at 2:59PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Flagler, south central St. Johns, eastern Marion and Putnam Counties through 345 PM EDT... At 259 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Orange Springs to near Lisbon. Movement was northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 40 to 45 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Palatka, Crescent City, Interlachen, Pomona Park, Hastings, East Palatka, Salt Springs, Andalusia, Juniper Springs and Lake Delancy. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Marion; Eastern Marion; Eastern Putnam; Inland Flagler; Inland St. Johns; Western Putnam
